document_name: Law  Nº20.283 on Native Forest Recovery and Forest Promotion
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CHL/2008/CHL-2008-12-25-Law  Nº20.283 on Native Forest Recovery and Forest Promotion_33cfea857482d64599cffc71726e9398.pdf
document_description: This law aims at securing the protection, recovery and improvement of native forests, in order to ensure forest sustainability and meet environmental policy goals. It notably encourages reforestation efforts using native plants.
